name: Illidan
title: The Betrayer
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Dive
abilities.description: Dive at the target, dealing 66 damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases Illidan's Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

heroics.name: Metamorphosis
heroics.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 200 for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

heroics.name: The Hunt
heroics.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

original.name: Illidan
original.title: The Betrayer
original.description: Illidan Stormrage, the first demon hunter, betrayed his people and created a new Well of Eternity after the demonic invasion of Azeroth. Now Illidan lords over Outland slaying unsuitably prepared Heroes who venture into his domain.
original.shortDescription: A mobile, sustained damage Assassin who pairs well with Heroes that can enable him.

trait.name: Betrayer's Thirst
trait.description: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

skins.name: The Betrayer
skins.description: Illidan Stormrage, the first demon hunter, betrayed his people and created a new Well of Eternity after the demonic invasion of Azeroth. Now Illidan lords over Outland slaying unsuitably prepared Heroes who venture into his domain.

skins.name: Eredar Armor Illidan
skins.description: The Blades of Azzinoth had served Illidan as dutiful companions while he tracked his prey across the Nexus... perhaps these Man'ari warplates would as well, in time.

skins.name: Spectre Illidan
skins.description: As the terrazine haze cleared from his mind, Illidan saw what he had become. His body had mutated, grown irreversibly addicted... But the power was worth any price.

skins.name: Shan'do Illidan
skins.description: Stormrage was born with amber eyes; a sign of great destiny... But as he learned from Cenarius, his brother grew distant. Still, none expected Malfurion's betrayal.

skins.name: Lunar Illidan
skins.description: For most of the year, Illidan loathes druidic customs. But during the Lunar Festival, even he sets aside old grudges and joins his brother in honoring the departed elders of the Stormrage family.
